message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. It is a unique opportunity that could significantly impact your business or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional value and potential benefits, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. This offer is designed to ensure you have the chance to acquire a game-changing asset. We look forward to discussing how this product can elevate your goals.
Alice, thank you for the offer, but $2000000 is beyond my budget. I'm very interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $1500000 at this time.  Would you be willing to consider this price?
